reviews.review_msg: Bing is an AMAZING prof and Jason is an incredible TA - together they make the class so inspiring! Lectures are fascinating and really speak to social issues and issues regarding the educational system. Tutorials are just as fun - you get to know your classmates and have the freedom to openly discuss the texts! This class is honestly life changing!

This has been my favourite class in all my years at SFU.  He cares about his students and what he teaches and has all these experiences and anecdotes that he uses to illustrate the material.  Students are viewed as equals, not "inferiors."  I recommend this to ANYONE, especially those going into the teaching field.  Great class.

Charles is awesome. He's hot, helpful and so amusing in lecture. He's a very positive man whose class is enlightening for anyone who wants to incorporate society and the education field. I recommend his class over and over to anyone. He's delightful.
